comment.body:
> [jrkenn](#comment_1_1CsrgbkcwRkqxA46U6czKLTDJRTVDRaddV): how do I update from version 0.6.5 to version 0.7.1 I have looked and just cant find this question anywhere. I go to the py3 updater page but when I click nothing happens

you cannot update from 0.6.5 to 0.7.1 directly just by clicking the update web. You must redownload the exe file of 0.7.1 in github.
